name: Fame Run (Mustafa Balta)
description:
It is a hyper-casual runner game. We are trying to become famous by making successful posts on social media platforms in the game. Player should collect likes and avoid dislikes.

Github Repo: https://github.com/mustafabalta8/FameRun

Team TAB  (The Game Circle's Jam Team)

Enes Eyüboğlu - Game Artist

Mustafa Balta - Game Developer
